about_the_game:
Protaganist's Word

This is indeed an intriguing case. My doctorate supervisor introduced a patient with a difficult condition to me after my graduation. At the age of six, the boy had hallucinations and often fantasized about traveling with his other persona. I had to say that the treatment process was quite unusual. I went on a trip to his imaginary world. How did I do it? It is hard to explain. You will have to see it yourself and all puzzles will be solved at the end.

Brief Introduction of The Story

After 20 years of meeting with Vinson Gogh, our protagonist Dr. Shawn received a letter and some souvenirs from Vinson. These things brought back some memories for Shawn from the treatment process. Now, let us follow Edward Shawn back to 20 years ago to witness Vinson's magical world. In this journey, you will play as Vinson's psychologist, step into his heart, solve the mystery and reveal the story behind it.

Solve Puzzles

Your patient will not open up to you at first, and you will face all kinds of obstacles in this journey. Incarnate as a kind traveler, and unearth the fantasies in his heart . Clear your mind, and engage in intricate puzzle, as long as you think carefully, nothing can stop you from understanding his deep mind.

Make Your Choices

It takes patience to understand a young heart, but don't forget that a word or two from a child means much more than you imagine. Are you his doctor or spiritual mentor?

Place Yourself in Fantasy Worlds

What are the origins of Vinson's fantasies? What makes his fantasies so real? All is left for you, a professional child psychology expert to answer.

Make Up The Story

Are you able to reveal the whole story by getting the pieces of information from the fantasy worlds? A psychologist had his rules of conduct, what decisions would you, Dr. Shawn, make to save the patient?

What Would I Experience in Vinnie's Diary?

Hear-Warming story and solving carefully-designed puzzles. During these hours of gameplay, in these colorful dreams, unravel the riddles and Vinson's secrets.
Can you help this six-year-old boy to let his dreams fly, becoming the person he wishes to see?

name: Vinnie's Diary

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3220 or AMD FX4300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 or AMD Radeon HD7750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 3GB or AMD Radeon HD7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: Vinnie' Diary is a FPP Puzzle Solving Game. The player will be the child psychologist Edward Shawn and explore what happened inside the inner world of a 6-year-old boy, Vinson Gogh. In the game, you will face puzzles in Vinson's fantasy worlds while analyzing the case as a professional psychologist.
